sign

public com.hp.hpl.jena.rdf.model.Model sign(com.hp.hpl.jena.rdf.model.Model m)
Sign the model m using the SignMaster sm and the informative subgraph info. Any existing signature is stripped from m before it is signed.

getSignatures

public static com.hp.hpl.jena.rdf.model.Model getSignatures(com.hp.hpl.jena.rdf.model.Model m)
Answer a model containing all the statements reachable from any Eyeball signature in base.
